definition[0]: having such a great effect on you that you feel confused and do not know how to react
example[1]: She felt an overwhelming desire to hit him.
example[2]: She found the city quite overwhelming when she first arrived.
definition[1]: very large or greater, more important etc than any other
example[3]: There is overwhelming evidence that smoking damages your health.
example[4]: An overwhelming majority of the members were against the idea.
example[5]: The proposal has been given overwhelming support.
example[6]: The British Air Force succeeded despite overwhelming odds against them.
